Name: precipitation rate
Description: intensity of rainfall in mm per h

Name: percentage
Description: relationship expressed as a fraction of 100

Name: per mille
Description: relationship expressed as a fraction of 1000

Name: relationship
Description: relationship between values of the same unit

Name: volume fraction
REMARK: unit=1, d.h. m³/m³, nicht cm³/m³ und kein %, aber in % umrechenbar

Name: mass fraction
REMARK: unit=1, d.h. g/g oder kg/kg, nicht g/kg und kein %, aber in % umrechenbar

Name: area fraction
REMARK: unit=1, d.h. m^2/m^2 oder cm^2/cm^2, nicht cm^2/m^2 und kein %, aber in % umrechenbar

Name: amount of substance per mas
Description: relationship between amount of substance and mass

Name: substance per area and time
Description: relationship between amount of substance and area by time

Name: substance per mass and time
Description: relationship between amount of substance and mass by time

Name: dateTime
Description: date or/and time of a moment

Name: dateTime as string
Description: date or/and time of a moment as string

Name: dateTime as integer
Description: date or/and time of a moment as integer

Name: dateTime as unix timestamp
REMARK: In dateTime konvertierbar, number of seconds since 1.1.1970

Name: specification, unable to order
REMARK: ! Nicht ungeordnet! Sondern: es ist keine Ordnung möglich

Name: specification, able to order
REMARK: ! Nicht geordnet! Sondern: es ist möglich eine Ordnung zu finden

Name: angle
Description: measure of a change in direction or orientation

Name: volume
Description: three dimensional extent of an object

Name: pH
Description: measure of the acidity or basicity

Name: age
Description: time interval of species being in years

Name: written range
Description: e.g. A to B or A-B etc.
